bug.author: karriebear
bug.summary: [File uploader] Displayed size of file uploader is not correctly calculated
bug.description: Examples: Actual: 214.9KB Expected: ~220kb Actual: 207.8KB Expected: ~213KB Actual: 2.3MB Expected: 2.4MB

comments.comment: Vaguely wonder if this is related to the difference between kB (1000 bytes) and KB (1024 bytes)? 214.9KB * 1024/1000 ~= 220kB, so that checks out...
That's my best guess but we do call out export const BYTE_CONVERSION_SIZE = 1024 so not sure where it's not getting converted properly. Need to investigate
